title: nixos: `note: rust-lld: error while loading shared libraries: libstdc++.so.6: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory `

labels.name: A-linkage
labels.description: Area: linking into static, shared libraries and binaries

labels.name: A-LLVM
labels.description: Area: Code generation parts specific to LLVM. Both correctness bugs and optimization-related issues.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
`note: rust-lld: error while loading shared libraries: libstdc++.so.6: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory`

when building `wasm32-unknown-unknown` on nixos

seems similar or the same as this IRC log https://logs.nix.samueldr.com/nixos/2018-09-15#1568323;

cause wasm to fail to build

```
error: linking with `rust-lld` failed: exit code: 127
  |
  = note: "rust-lld" "-flavor" "wasm" "-L" "/home/holochain/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/wasm32-unknown-unknown/lib" "/home/holochain/holochain-rust/core/src/nucleus/wasm-test/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/deps/debug.debug.4fhiz1r9-cgu.5.rcgu.o" "-o" "/home/holochain/holochain-rust/core/src/nucleus/wasm-test/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/deps/debug.wasm" "--export" "debug_hello" "--export" "debug_stacked_hello" "--export" "debug_multiple" "--gc-sections" "-O2" "-L" "/home/holochain/holochain-rust/core/src/nucleus/wasm-test/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/deps" "-L" "/home/holochain/holochain-rust/core/src/nucleus/wasm-test/target/release/deps" "-L" "/home/holochain/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/wasm32-unknown-unknown/lib" "/home/holochain/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/wasm32-unknown-unknown/lib/libcompiler_builtins-7cd1fa06f8e8a370.rlib" "--no-threads" "-z" "stack-size=1048576" "--stack-first" "--allow-undefined" "--no-entry" "--export-table" "--fatal-warnings"
  = note: rust-lld: error while loading shared libraries: libstdc++.so.6: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
          

error: aborting due to previous error

error: Could not compile `debug`.
```
